alert.note: Alert for Delta; Hopkins; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 7:47AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hopkins, northeastern Delta and southern Lamar Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 746 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roxton, or 10 miles southwest of Paris, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Roxton, Tira, Atlas, Glory, Pacio, Broadway Junction, Minter, Howland, Biardstown, Taylor Town, Nelta, Clardy, Milton, Cunningham and Gadston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for north central Texas.
